overview: A vigilante masked as Batman roams the streets of his city at night to liberate humanity from a new type of plague. A molotov cocktail mixed with vandalism, cosplay and E-scooters. A scourge known in many Swedish cities.  The Real Dark Knight plays as a mockumentary but so absurdly realistic so it feels like a documentary. It is a contemporary look at solitary struggles and heartfelt vigilantism.
title: The real dark knight
